name: Crazy Cubes (Spiky Games)
description:
Crazy Cubes is a platformer with a simplistic style, but many features that make for a high skill gap. There are extra features for speedrunners, like in-game timers and frame loggers.

There are 45 levels to play, and 17 Characters to unlock!!

Controls:

Walk: A & D 

Jump: W

Slide: Shift 

Perfect Jump: W (Press the moment you land on the ground)

Shoot: Left Mouse Button
